document.full_text: mr. sachs, the heir to a german industrial fortune, was known in his youth as a playboy; he later became a well-known art collector.
document.title: gunter sachs, ex-husband of brigitte bardot, dies at 78
lines_and_colors: mr. sachs, the heir to a german industrial fortune, was known in his youth as a playboy; he later became a well-known art collector.
